text: John Allan Yarmuth (born November 4, 1947) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 2007 to 2023. He was the only Democratic member of Kentucky's congressional delegation. In August 2019, Yarmuth endorsed Bernie Sanders's 2020 presidential campaign.Congressman John Yarmuth speaks during Bernie Sanders rally On October 12, 2021, Yarmuth announced that he would not seek re-election in 2022. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Kentucky Category:Politicians from Louisville, Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Yarmuth
